entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
